Name: Monstrous Heads
Description:
The Chimaera has three heads, chosen or rolled for from the following list, each unique. Each head has a unique set of powers, shares the chimaera's space, is separately targetable, and has its own hit points (1/3 of its max HP, rounded up). Statuses, marks, or other effects only affect the currently acting head. Only one head is targetable at a time, even if an attack has area of effect. Damage that 'spills over' on one head is lost.
Each time the Chimaera takes a turn, it takes a turn with only one of its heads. A different head must act from the last head that acted, unless there is only one head left. The Chimaera is only defeated when all three heads are defeated.

Name: Feral Rage
Description: The Chimaera's remaining head gains +1 action and becomes unstoppable. (Immune to all statuses. Can't be immobilized, shoved, or teleported by foes)

Name: Lion's Pride
Description: At the end of its turn, gains vigilance 1. Can intercept attacks against other heads.

Name: Bull's Fortitude
Description: All heads are Sturdy while the Bull head is alive. (Immune to shove, dazed, and stunned)

Name: Noxious Venom
Description: While the Toad head is alive, all heads have counter. (Each time a foe deals damage to you with an ability, deal 2 damage back)

Name: Goat's Shield
Description: While the goat is alive, the Chimaera's heads have Aetherwall. (Gains automatic cover against all attacks that originate outside of range 2 from them. Cover grants resistance against ranged attacks, reducing it by 1/2)
